Jumping Light Kick (During a jump) L

moves.nameEN: OD High Tiger Shot M H

moves.notesEN: Invincible against mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes from frames 1 - 14 Considered airborne from frames 9 - 49
moves.notesCN: 1-14帧对空无敌，9-49帧浮空

moves.notesEN: Invincible against mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes from frames 1 - 13 Considered airborne from frames 14 - 59
moves.notesCN: 1-13帧对空无敌，14-59帧浮空

moves.notesEN: Hold down the button for over 24 frames to change its properties Invincible against mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes from frames 1 - 21 Considered airborne from frames 22 - 67
moves.notesCN: 按住按钮超过24帧蓄力，1-21帧对空无敌，22-67帧浮空

moves.notesEN: Invincible against mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes from frames 1 - 9 and 28 - 38 Considered airborne from frames 39 - 84
Completely invincible between frames 1 - 12 Considered airborne from frames 13 - 57
Considered airborne from frames 13 - 27 Recovery added by 3 frames on super armor hit
moves.notesCN: 13-27帧浮空，击中霸体后+3f收招

moves.notesEN: Considered airborne from frames 16 - 31 Recovery added by 3 frames on super armor hit
moves.notesCN: 16-31帧浮空，击中霸体后+3f收招

moves.notesEN: Considered airborne from frames 24 - 43 Damage changed to 1300 and blowback time is increased when hitting the attack in a specific location between the 3rd and 4th active frame of the first attack.
moves.notesCN: 24-43帧浮空，当打击帧第3和第4帧时在特定位置命中对手伤害改为1300，增加推板距离

moves.notesEN: Considered airborne from frames 21 - 38 Blowback time increased when hitting from close range
moves.notesCN: 21-38帧浮空，近距离时推板距离增加

moves.notesEN: Can transition to Mighty Tiger, Greedy Tiger and Nova Tiger between frames 25 - 28 Forces a juggle state when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
moves.notesCN: 25-28帧可以派生后续，打康或确反康造成浮空硬直

moves.notesEN: Can transition to Mighty Tiger, Greedy Tiger and Nova Tiger between frames 28 - 31 Forces a juggle state when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
moves.notesCN: 28-31帧可以派生后续，打康或确反康造成浮空硬直

moves.notesEN: Recovery increased by 2 frames on Perfect Parry Can transition to Mighty Tiger, Greedy Tiger and Nova Tiger between frames 38 - 41
moves.notesCN: 被精防后+2f收招，38-41帧派生后续

moves.notesEN: Recovery increased by 2 frames on Perfect Parry Can transition to Mighty Tiger, Greedy Tiger and Nova Tiger between frames 33 - 36
moves.notesCN: 被精防后+2f收招，33-36帧派生后续

moves.notesEN: Adds a floor bounding effect during a mid-air hit

moves.nameEN: OD Nova Tiger (During OD Tiger Nexus) H

moves.notesEN: Invincible to strikes and throws on frames 1 - 13 Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 30%
moves.notesCN: 1-13帧打投无敌，伤害不会随打康类型改变，保底修正30%

moves.notesEN: Completely invincible on frames 1 - 14 Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 40% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter Pressing a direction on frame 76 after the attack hits produces a different follow-up attack: Neutral - Savage Tiger Raid Forward - Savage Tiger Zenith Back - Savage Tiger Pendulum Down - Savage Tiger Stomp
moves.notesCN: 1-14帧无敌，保底修正40%，伤害不会随打康种类改变。命中后第76帧输入后续派生指令。

moves.notesEN: Completely invincible between frames 1 - 15 The minimum guaranteed damage is 50% Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter * Can only be canceled into from special moves
moves.notesCN: 1-15帧无敌，保底修正50%，伤害不会随打康种类改变，只能取消必杀

moves.notesEN: Completely invincible between frames 1 - 15 The minimum guaranteed damage is 50% Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter * Can only be canceled into from special moves
moves.notesCN: 1-15帧无敌，保底修正50%，伤害不会随打康种类改变，只能取消必杀

moves.nameEN: Tiger Hang (When near opponent) L L
moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.nameEN: Tiger Carry (When near opponent) L L
moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.notesEN: Invincible to throws between frames 1 - 15
moves.notesCN: 第1-15帧对投无敌

moves.nameEN: Drive Impact: Tiger Punishment H H
moves.notesEN: Super Armor for 2 attacks between frames 1 - 27 Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall On Punish Counter or after a successful hit after Super Armor absorbs a hit, the following properties change: - Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground - Juggle state time is increased if the opponent is in the air - Super Art gauge increases by 3000
moves.notesCN: 第1-27帧两次打击霸体，版边会造成对手墙崩。打到确反康性质变化：1，会造成对手进入崩防硬直；2，命中浮空对手时浮空硬直时间增加；3，超级必杀槽增加3000

moves.nameEN: Drive Reversal (while blocking): Tiger Twin Babel (When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry) H H
moves.notesEN: Recoverable damage Completely invincible between frames 1 - 22 5 frames of recovery added on hit
moves.notesCN: 伤害为白血，第1-22帧无敌，击中对手增加5f收招

moves.nameEN: Drive Reversal (while recovering): Tiger Twin Babel (During knockdown recovery) H H
moves.notesEN: Recoverable damage Completely invincible between frames 1 - 20 5 frames of recovery added on hit
moves.notesCN: 伤害为白血，第1-20帧无敌，击中对手增加5f收招

moves.notesEN: *1 Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive Rush *2 Parry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period Always in Punish Counter state during execution
moves.notesCN: 1，从第4帧开始能被绿冲取消；2，蓝防判定会随着按钮的时间延长，但是在蓝防的收招动作中仅有格挡能够取消蓝防的收招，在蓝防动作的持续中，只要被攻击命中就必定为确反康

moves.nameEN: Perfect Parry (strike) Block Direction M M
moves.notesEN: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame. (For high and overhead attacks, the player must press the direction away from the opponent. For low attacks, down and back) If no direction is inputted the result will be a regular parry with an additional Drive increase of 3000. Fully invincible for 5 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry) The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished
moves.notesCN: 在输入蓝防的当前帧或下一帧被打击时，会触发完美精防，（对上段/中段攻击，需同时输入后，对下段攻击需同时输入下后）。如果没有输入任何方向，则判定为普通蓝防，但额外增加3000点斗气槽回复。完美精防结束后获得5f的无敌帧（如果持续按住蓝防则不获得）。被完美精防的一方在动作结束前不能取消招式，且如果在动作结束前被击中则一定是确反康

moves.notesEN: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame No screen freeze occurs The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished
moves.notesCN: 在输入蓝防的当前帧或下一帧被打击时，会触发完美精防，不会出现屏幕冻结特效，被精防波动的一方不能取消动作，且在动作结束前被命中一定会出确反康

moves.nameEN: Parry Drive Rush (During a Drive Parry)
moves.notesEN: Screen freeze occurs until the 10th frame * Can be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame
moves.notesCN: 第1-10帧出现屏幕冻结特效，第9帧开始能够被攻击动作取消，第24帧开始能被除了蓝防以外的任何动作取消

moves.nameEN: Cancel Drive Rush (While connecting with a special-cancelable move)
moves.notesEN: Screen freeze occurs until the 9th frame * Can be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
moves.notesCN: 第1-9帧出现屏幕冻结特效，第10帧开始可以被攻击动作取消，第25帧开始可以被除了蓝防以外的任何动作取消
